Name: Retro Red
Description: Hailing from the neon-lit arcades of the 80s, Retro Red is a member of the prestigious WebtrES club, known for its collection of sentient gaming consoles. With his sleek rossoCorsa box, he's an eye-catcher and a conversation starter wherever he goes. His retroConsole buttons have felt the touch of countless enthusiasts seeking the nostalgia of pixelated adventures. Retro Red's red and black screen often flickers with images of old-school battles, a testament to his undying love for vintage games. Despite his handDown pose that suggests a moment of rest, he's always ready to jump into action and share the thrill of a classic game with anyone willing to press 'start'.
